overview: The Crusty crew travel to remote locations in Australia, Dominican Republic, Mexico, Nevada and Utah to capture the most extreme action, sickest stunts and radical maneuvers ever seen. Crusty Demons Nine Lives showcases Ryan Capes' record-breaking 260' jump, monster truck competition, street bike action, another crazy skit featuring Bubba as a crossing guard and some of the craziest stunts ever filmed.
title: Crusty Demons: Nine Lives
